formatted_address: 30 Raffles Pl, B1-18 CIMB Plaza, Singapore 048622
name: Local Coffee People - CIMB Plaza

reviews.text: Decided to leave a review but couldn't find the google page for " One Raffles"outlet, came here couple of times and enjoyed the good coffee! Thanks for keeping is at such a gem price! And not to forget both the Thai ladies at One raffles outlet. Always so cheerful ðŸ˜Š Hope you have a blooming business ahead!

Ordered the Baguette Set with Beef, Lemon Grass Chicken Roll and Lemongrass. Total is S$11.90

Overall all, value for money, and good tasting too. Really enjoyed the chew Lemongrass chicken roll and the thick beef slices.

Baguette was large and came with carrots, lettuce, some sweet sauce and the beef slices. I especially liked the crunchy bread, which went well with the sweet sauce and fillings. The beef was nicely seasoned too.

The Lemongrass chicken roll had a chewy exterior with a delicious interior.

The Lemongrass drink was slightly sweet, but not too sweet.
Pretty good iced coffee or bubble tea. I forgot what I ordered but it was nice and strong and cold. Woke me right up.

The ordering process is very fast, order from the small counter.
The preparation process is very fast too, for those Teh/ Kopi, they pre-prepared in advance.
For teh, it can be very sweet. Teh taste is lesser.
Price is reasonable and good around the area.
But the queue can be very difficult to identify.
Am a frog in the well at singapore CBD. Tried this Vietnamese roll and itâ€™s worth it. $10.90 for 3 rolls or add $1 for prawn and duck roll. Comes with a lemon grass drink. Doable. No complain.
